message.content: This question requires knowledge about how pulleys work. A pulley is a simple machine that is used to lift or lower objects by using a rope or cable and a wheel. By pulling on one end of the rope, the object attached to the other end is lifted. Therefore, a pulley is used to increase altitude or raise objects to higher positions. Option (A) is incorrect because a pulley does not crush objects. Option (B) is incorrect because a pulley does not have the ability to cool objects. Option (D) is incorrect because a pulley does not have the capability to elevate significance.
